00022 SerialPort::SerialPort(UINT32 baudRate, UINT8 dataBits, SerialPort::Parity parity, SerialPort::StopBits stopBits)
00023     : m_resourceManagerHandle (0)
00024     , m_portHandle (0)
00025     , m_consoleModeEnabled (false)
00026 {
00027     ViStatus status = VI_SUCCESS;
00028     status = viOpenDefaultRM((ViSession*)&m_resourceManagerHandle);
00029     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00030 
00031     status = viOpen(m_resourceManagerHandle, "ASRL1::INSTR", VI_NULL, VI_NULL, (ViSession*)&m_portHandle);
00032     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00033     if (status != 0)
00034     {
00035         m_consoleModeEnabled = true;
00036         return;
00037     }
00038 
00039     status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_BAUD, baudRate);
00040     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00041     status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_DATA_BITS, dataBits);
00042     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00043     status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_PARITY, parity);
00044     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00045     status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_STOP_BITS, stopBits);
00046     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00047 
00048     // Set the default timeout to 5 seconds.
00049     SetTimeout(5.0f);
00050 
00051     // Don't wait until the buffer is full to transmit.
00052     SetWriteBufferMode(kFlushOnAccess);
00053 
00054     EnableTermination();
00055 
00056     //viInstallHandler(m_portHandle, VI_EVENT_IO_COMPLETION, ioCompleteHandler, this);
00057     //viEnableEvent(m_portHandle, VI_EVENT_IO_COMPLETION, VI_HNDLR, VI_NULL);
00058 }
00059 
00063 SerialPort::~SerialPort()
00064 {
00065     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00066     {
00067         //viUninstallHandler(m_portHandle, VI_EVENT_IO_COMPLETION, ioCompleteHandler, this);
00068         viClose(m_portHandle);
00069     }
00070     viClose(m_resourceManagerHandle);
00071 }

00078 void SerialPort::SetFlowControl(SerialPort::FlowControl flowControl)
00079 {
00080     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00081     {
00082         ViStatus status = viSetAttribute (m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_FLOW_CNTRL, flowControl);
00083         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00096 void SerialPort::EnableTermination(char terminator)
00097 {
00098     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00099     {
00100         viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_TERMCHAR_EN, VI_TRUE); 
00101         viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_TERMCHAR, terminator);
00102         viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_END_IN, VI_ASRL_END_TERMCHAR);
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00109 void SerialPort::DisableTermination()
00110 {
00111     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00112     {
00113         viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_TERMCHAR_EN, VI_FALSE); 
00114         viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_END_IN, VI_ASRL_END_NONE);
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00123 INT32 SerialPort::GetBytesReceived()
00124 {
00125     INT32 bytes = 0;
00126     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00127     {
00128         ViStatus status = viGetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_ASRL_AVAIL_NUM, &bytes);
00129         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00130     }
00131     return bytes;
00132 }

00141 void SerialPort::Printf(const char *writeFmt, ...)
00142 {
00143     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00144     {
00145         va_list args;
00146         va_start (args, writeFmt);
00147         ViStatus status = viVPrintf(m_portHandle, (ViString)writeFmt, args);
00148         va_end (args);
00149         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00150     }
00151 }

00162     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)

00179 UINT32 SerialPort::Read(char *buffer, INT32 count)
00180 {
00181     UINT32 retCount = 0;
00182     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00183     {
00184         ViStatus status = viBufRead(m_portHandle, (ViPBuf)buffer, count, (ViPUInt32)&retCount);
00185         switch (status)
00186         {
00187         case VI_SUCCESS_TERM_CHAR:
00188         case VI_SUCCESS_MAX_CNT:
00189         case VI_ERROR_TMO: // Timeout
00190             break;
00191         default:
00192             wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00193         }
00194     }
00195     return retCount;
00196 }
00197 
00205 UINT32 SerialPort::Write(const char *buffer, INT32 count)
00206 {
00207     UINT32 retCount = 0;
00208     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00209     {
00210         ViStatus status = viBufWrite(m_portHandle, (ViPBuf)buffer, count, (ViPUInt32)&retCount);
00211         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00212     }
00213     return retCount;
00214 }

00224 void SerialPort::SetTimeout(float timeout)
00225 {
00226     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00227     {
00228         ViStatus status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_TMO_VALUE, (UINT32)(timeout * 1e3));
00229         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00230     }
00231 }

00282 void SerialPort::SetWriteBufferMode(SerialPort::WriteBufferMode mode)
00283 {
00284     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00285     {
00286         ViStatus status = viSetAttribute(m_portHandle, VI_ATTR_WR_BUF_OPER_MODE, mode);

00297 void SerialPort::Flush()
00298 {
00299     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00300     {
00301         ViStatus status = viFlush(m_portHandle, VI_WRITE_BUF);
00302         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00303     }
00304 }

00311 void SerialPort::Reset()
00312 {
00313     if (!m_consoleModeEnabled)
00314     {
00315         ViStatus status = viClear(m_portHandle);
00316         wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00317     }
00318 }
